backend/main.mo: Defines data types and storage maps for budgets, expenses, attendance, notes, reminders, and authorization, and exposes approval-related methods with access control. Implements core actor state and initialization for user-specific records.
feature_evidence.json: Provides a feature evidence report mapping features to source files, components, and test IDs with high-confidence indicators.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of key frontend files describing functionality like layout, state management, Excel parsing, VLOOKUP, animations, and navigation.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind-based styles including color variables, dark mode values, and base styling for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets up the root container, favicon, metadata, and loads the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring providers, tab navigation, layout structure, and user setup with React Query.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Atten: Attendance editor UI for modifying daily attendance entries with validation, time parsing, and save handling.
Renders a monthly attendance calendar with navigation, date selection, and visual indicators for holidays and attendance entries.
Provides UI to select a date range and export attendance summaries as a PDF, handling loading, errors, and export status.
frontend/src/components/attendance/Holid: Allows admins to view, add, and delete holidays for the selected month with validation and feedback messages.
frontend/src/components/auth/ApprovalGat: Restricts access based on approval status, showing pending/request UI for unapproved users and granting access to approved or admin users.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Displays a login/logout button using Internet Identity, managing authentication status and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/UserProfile: Prompts newly authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and save their profile via a modal dialog.
frontend/src/components/character/Armore: Defines a 3D armored hero mesh with animation states using react-three-fiber, applying different positional and rotational motions per animation type.
frontend/src/components/character/Charac: Displays the 3D character with an animation determined by the active tab or reminders and shows a small status label.
frontend/src/components/deskboard/ClockC: Renders a live digital clock and a monthly calendar view inside a styled card component.
frontend/src/components/errors/AppErrorB: Implements a global error boundary that catches runtime errors, displays details, and provides reset and reload actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the application header with authentication controls, navigation, workbook upload handling, and reset actions.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Wraps the app with header, footer, main content, character dock, and reminder notifier layout structure.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSi: Provides a sidebar navigation menu with grouped tabs, tooltips, admin-specific items, and active-state highlighting.
frontend/src/components/reminders/InAppR: Displays in‑app reminder notifications, handles sound playback, and allows dismissing or enabling sound when blocked.
frontend/src/components/reminders/TechHe: Shows an animated Tech Hero image with fallback to a static version if loading fails.
frontend/src/components/results/ResultRo: Provides a modal for editing table row data and saving changes for export.
frontend/src/components/search/ExploreHe: Renders a panel that embeds Google search results or opens them in a new tab if embedding fails.
frontend/src/components/table/DataPrevie: Displays sheet headers and rows in a scrollable preview table with handling for empty cells and no data.
frontend/src/components/table/Horizontal: Wraps table content to add horizontal scrolling for wide tables.
frontend/src/components/updateChecking/U: Search bar for filtering update‑checking results by keyword and match type with a clear option.
frontend/src/components/vlookup/VlookupA: Generates and plays step‑by‑step animated VLOOKUP explanations based on data and search parameters.
frontend/src/context/ReminderEventsConte: Context managing active reminders with functions to set or dismiss them.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useApproval.ts: Provides queries for checking caller approval/admin status and listing approvals using the backend actor.
Provides mutations for requesting user approval and setting another user's approval status, with validation and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendance.ts: Implements queries and mutations for attendance configs, check‑ins, check‑outs, and summaries using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAttendanceCalendar: Fetches all attendance entries and maps them into calendar event objects for calendar display.
frontend/src/hooks/useCalendarEvents.ts: Defines calendar event types and stubbed queries/mutations for user-created events, which are not yet supported by the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useHolidays.ts: Adds queries and mutations for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting global holidays with admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInAppReminderNotif: Watches reminders and triggers in-app notifications when due, with cleanup of old notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityMutati: Defines React Query mutations for creating and deleting reminders and todo items, with checks for identity and backend readiness. Calendar event mutations are stubbed out with errors since the backend no longer supports them.
frontend/src/hooks/useProductivityQuerie: Provides React Query hooks to fetch reminders, todos, notes, and calendar events, including mapping functions to convert backend data to frontend formats. Calendar events always return an empty list due to lack of backend support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Implements history-related queries and mutations, allowing listing, filtering, adding, and clearing history entries via the backend actor. Uses React Query for caching and invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegularExpense.ts: Includes hooks for fetching and saving budget data, listing expenses, and adding new expenses with validation and history logging. Uses identity and actor checks before performing backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Provides hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile with proper handling of actor readiness and query state. Saves profile changes and invalidates cached profile data on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based global styles, color variables, macOS-inspired UI classes, and background styling. Includes light and dark mode variable sets and utility classes for visual effects.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/attendancePd: Maps attendance summaries into structured export data for PDF generation, including summary rows, daily breakdown, and formatted times. Also generates filenames for exported attendance reports.
frontend/src/lib/attendance/dateRanges.t: Provides utilities for formatting dates and durations and computing current week, month, and year ranges.
frontend/src/lib/character/tabAnimationM: Defines animation types and maps tab IDs to animations with a helper to retrieve the animation for a tab.
frontend/src/lib/compare/compareWorkbook: Compares two Excel sheets by key, row, or column differences and returns structured comparison results.
frontend/src/lib/compare/filterCompariso: Filters comparison rows by keyword using exact or contains matching across key and cell values.
frontend/src/lib/compare/normalizeRowSig: Generates normalized row signatures and aligns old row data to new header order for comparison.
frontend/src/lib/excel/normalizeHeader.t: Normalizes, sanitizes, and searches Excel headers for consistent matching across workbooks.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseWorkbook.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and parses uploaded Excel files into structured sheet data with sanitized headers.
Builds filtered expense report data, calculates totals, and generates filenames for weekly, monthly, or yearly reports.
frontend/src/lib/export/branding.ts: Provides branding config and utilities to load logo and watermark assets as base64 or image elements for exports.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportPdf.ts: Loads jsPDF dynamically and generates branded landscape PDFs with headers, footers, data tables, and optional watermark.
frontend/src/lib/export/exportXlsx.ts: Loads SheetJS dynamically and exports data to an Excel file with a branding title row.
frontend/src/lib/export/pdfCompanyInfo.t: Defines company contact, footer details, and a shared config object for PDF branding.
frontend/src/lib/notes/noteEncoding.ts: Encodes and decodes note title and content into a single backend text field using a separator.
frontend/src/lib/results/applyRowEdits.t: Applies in-memory edited rows to base data using a row index map.
frontend/src/lib/results/exportFilters.t: Provides helpers to list filterable columns, extract unique values, and filter rows by column/value.
frontend/src/lib/results/historyExport.t: Maps history entries to labeled rows and exports them to Excel or PDF.
frontend/src/lib/vlookup/vlookup.ts: Implements exact and approximate VLOOKUP with multiple return columns and detailed match results.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminUsersTab.tsx: Admin UI for viewing, approving, and rejecting users with status badges and mutation handling.
frontend/src/pages/AttendanceTab.tsx: Implements a full attendance management interface including check-in/out, settings, calendar views, summaries, and editing entries using multiple hooks and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/CalendarTab.tsx: Renders a combined user and attendance event calendar with create/delete dialogs, authentication checks, and event sorting.
frontend/src/pages/DeskboardTab.tsx: Provides a productivity dashboard with search, quick-add dialogs, and displays reminders, events, todos, and notes using various hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryTab.tsx: Displays user activity history with filtering, grouping, export options, and type-specific icons, requiring login to view.
frontend/src/pages/NotesTab.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view, create, and delete notes with dialogs, error handling, and sorting by last-updated timestamp.
frontend/src/pages/RegularExpenseTab.tsx: Manages budgeting and recurring expenses with CRUD operations, validation, and PDF export. Handles budget limits, expense forms, editing dialogs, and report generation.
frontend/src/pages/RemindersTab.tsx: Displays and manages user reminders with create/delete actions and a dialog for adding new reminders. Requires authentication and handles basic validation and error reporting.
frontend/src/pages/ResultsTab.tsx: Shows VLOOKUP, filter, and update‑checking results with row‑editing support and export to Excel/PDF. Manages edit modals, export filtering, and history logging.
frontend/src/pages/SearchTab.tsx: Provides VLOOKUP and row‑filtering tools for workbook data, recording history entries and updating global state. Supports match types, multi‑value lookup, and input validation.
frontend/src/pages/TodoTab.tsx: Displays and manages a to‑do list with create and toggle actions via dialogs and mutations. Requires authentication and handles basic error reporting.
frontend/src/pages/UpdateCheckingTab.tsx: UI for uploading a new Excel file, selecting a key column, and comparing it with the current workbook to detect new rows and record history.
frontend/src/pages/UploadTab.tsx: Handles workbook upload, sheet selection, validation, and history logging while updating app state with parsed Excel data.
frontend/src/state/appState.tsx: Global React state for workbook data, search and comparison results, history tracking, and update helpers with normalization logic.
frontend/src/utils/attendance/configMapp: Utility functions to convert, validate, and build attendance configurations involving time and policy values.
frontend/src/utils/errors/userFriendlyEr: Converts raw error objects into user-friendly messages with special handling for common backend issues.
frontend/src/utils/number/parseNatBigInt: Parses and validates numeric strings into non-negative BigInt values suitable for Nat types.
frontend/src/utils/principal/parsePrinci: Safely parses and validates ICP Principal IDs from strings or objects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hashes, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system, custom shadows, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s project state, including summary, architecture notes, existing reminder and character-animation features, and versioned requirements.
